ioformat.images

Class OpenCVFeatureIO

  • java.lang.Object
    • ioformat.images.OpenCVFeatureIO

  • public class OpenCVFeatureIO
extends java.lang.Object
    This class handles saving and loading keypoints and descriptors in the OpenCV data format. OpenCV is a widely used image processing library used for feature extraction.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      OpenCVFeatureIO()

      Load the local feature representation from the keypoint and descriptor files in the OpenCV format.
      static void writeRepresentationToFiles(LFeatRepresentation imageRepresentation, java.io.File keypointFile, java.io.File descriptorFile)
      Saves the image feature representation into the keypoint and descriptor file in the OpenCV format.

    • Method Detail

      • loadImageRepresentation

        public static LFeatRepresentation loadImageRepresentation(java.io.File keypointFile,
                                          java.io.File descriptorFile)
                                                   throws java.io.IOException
        Load the local feature representation from the keypoint and descriptor files in the OpenCV format.
        Parameters:
        keypointFile - File that holds the keypoint specification for the image.
        descriptorFile - File that holds the descriptor value for the image.
        Returns:
        LFeatRepresentation loaded from the files.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • writeRepresentationToFiles

        public static void writeRepresentationToFiles(LFeatRepresentation imageRepresentation,
                              java.io.File keypointFile,
                              java.io.File descriptorFile)
                                       throws java.io.IOException
        Saves the image feature representation into the keypoint and descriptor file in the OpenCV format.
        Parameters:
        imageRepresentation - LFeatRepresentation to save.
        keypointFile - File that will hold the keypoint specification for the image.
        descriptorFile - File that will hold the descriptor value for the image.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
